Package com.sun.xml.wss.impl.misc

Class Base64

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.xml.wss.impl.misc.Base64
  • public class Base64
extends Object
    Implementation of MIME's Base64 encoding and decoding conversions. Optimized code. (raw version taken from oreilly.jonathan.util, and currently com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.ds.util.Base64)
    Author:
    Raul Benito(Of the xerces copy, and little adaptations)., Anli Shundi, Christian Geuer-Pollmann
    See Also:
    RFC 2045, TransformBase64Decode
